Posts.Content: Nov 19, 2007 02:16AM Sillymommax4 wrote: Dear pjr,  I am playing the waiting game too. I found my lump under my left arm it too is very tender. I had my mamo and US in July. I had a Breast MRI last Thursday I will hear those results anytime now. What I have been doing is keeping myself very busy. My house shines like a new penny lol. I am 42 with 4 children 2 are grown and 2 are still at home with us. By staying very busy I have managed to stay sane so to speak. The first couple of weeks I cried alot and messed around here but the last bit here I have found an inner me that I didn't even know I had. More than a few prayers have been said and I feel answered at my house. The good lord has given me a feeling of peace that everything is as it should be and things will be just fine. Please hold on and know we are all pulling for you.
